description:
"There are painters who transform the sun to a yellow spot, but there are others who with the help of their art and their intelligence, transform a yellow spot into the sun." Grab the Artisan Swimsuit Outfit and paint the 2D town red!

Note: Players can access the Artisan Swimsuit Outfit by going to the Menu and scrolling to the Equipment section. The Artisan Swimsuit Outfit is purely cosmetic and is visible during battle, cut scenes, and exploration segments with Neptune. Mix-n-match with the animal sets for fun!
name: Artisan Swimsuit Outfit
